1370: Wijfgode moved to Davids hof.B.6 after marriage.
Got married to Gerrit at age 19 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Geraldus in 1371 at age 20.
1372: Gave birth to Gerrit in 1372 at age 21.
1373: Gave birth to Erkenradis in 1373 at age 22.
1376: Gave birth to Baua in 1376 at age 25.
1377: Gave birth to Ghisele in 1377 at age 26.
1378: Gave birth to Veder in 1378 at age 27.
1380: Gave birth to Rabburgis in 1380 at age 29.
1382: Lost daughter Rabburgis when Rabburgis was 3 years old.
